Texto: 
single contrast esophagram demonstrates numerous lower esophageal non-propulsive contractions ending in a round hiatal hernia. this is also known as corkscrew esophagus.
diffuse esophageal spasm
diffuse esophageal spasm
presbyesophagus
67 year old caucasian male with chest pressure and dysphagia.
